code: import newsData from'../data/news';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"hero-title",children:"\u0414\u043E\u0431\u0440\u043E \u043F\u043E\u0436\u0430\u043B\u043E\u0432\u0430\u0442\u044C \u0432 NewsSite"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"hero-subtitle",children:"\u0427\u0438\u0442\u0430\u0439\u0442\u0435 \u043F\u043E\u0441\u043B\u0435\u0434\u043D\u0438\u0435 \u043D\u043E\u0432\u043E\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0438 \u0430\u043D\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u0438\u043A\u0443 \u0432 \u0443\u0434\u043E\u0431\u043D\u043E\u043C \u0444\u043E\u0440\u043C\u0430\u0442\u0435"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"news-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"\u041F\u043E\u0441\u043B\u0435\u0434\u043D\u0438\u0435 \u043D\u043E\u0432\u043E\u0441\u0442\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"news-grid",children:newsData.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/article/${item.id}`,className:"news-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.summary}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"read-more",children:"\u0427\u0438\u0442\u0430\u0442\u044C \u0434\u0430\u043B\u0435\u0435 \u2192"})]},item.id))})]})]});}
